title.en: Isekai de Cheat Skill wo Te ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai wo mo Musou Suru ~Level Up wa Jinsei wo Kaeta~

altTitles.en: I Got a Cheat Ability in a Different World, and Became Extraordinary Even in the Real World.

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Cheat Nouryoku Ote ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai o mo Musou Suru.

altTitles.ru: Я обрёл читерскую способность в другом мире и стал необычайным человеком в этом мире. История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.
Я получил читерские способности в другом мире, и стал экстраординарным в реальном мире~ История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.

altTitles.ja: 異世界でチート能力（スキル）を手にした俺は、現実世界をも無双する ～レベルアップは人生を変えた～
異世界でチート能力を手にした俺は、現実世界をも無双する

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界得到開掛能力的我、現實世界中也舉世無雙

altTitles.en: I Got a Cheat Skill in Another World and Became Unrivaled in The Real World, Too

altTitles.zh: 异世界得到开挂能力的我、现实世界中也举世无双

altTitles.th: สกิลโกงไร้เทียมทาน สร้างตำนานในสองโลก

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 치트 능력(스킬)을 손에 넣은 나는, 현실 세계에서도 무쌍한다

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Cheat Nōryoku (Skill) o Te ni Shita Ore wa, Genjitsu Sekai o mo Musō Suru ~ Level Up wa Jinsei o Kaeta ~

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Có Được Năng Lực Bá Đạo Ở Dị Giới, Tôi Cũng Vô Đối Ở Thế Giới Thực: Thăng Cấp Xong Thì Cuộc Đời Cũng Thay Đổi

description.en: Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is…
description.pt-br: Tenjo Yuuya sofre bully desde criança. Sua vida se resumia em passar o tempo na casa de seu avô e ir para a escola. Porém, ele sofria uma rotina diária de bully severo em sua escola, algumas vezes o pobre Yuuya se via obrigado a pedir licença para curar suas feridas. Mas em uma dessas licenças, ele acaba descobrindo um armazém de objetos que seu avô guardava, e entre esses objetos estava uma porta misteriosa. E claro, ele abriu a porta, e lá ele encontrou…

biography.en: **Name In Native Language:** 港川一臣
